alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, southwestern Wakulla, southern Liberty and Franklin Counties through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 428 PM EDT/328 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Apalachicola to 13 miles southwest of Crawfordville. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Beverly, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bay City, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Curtis Mill, Hays Place, Fort Gadsden, Nine Mile, Alligator Point and Buck Siding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
